title: מחפשים עבודה? 10 משרות חדשות למפתחים
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
 
LoadRunner is the industry-standard software for performance engineering and for application load testing. It supports various communication protocols and technologies and is used by customers around the world.
LoadRunner R&D group is a highly dynamic and professional team, using a wide range of development methodologies and technologies to deliver and maintain a unique solution and an outstanding product.
Looking for an experienced Back End developer, passionate about code and technologies, to join a leading team.
Requirements:
– B.Sc. in Computer Science or equivalent
– At least 2 years’ experience as a Back End developer.
– Experience with protocol level coding: HTTP, TCP, SSL, Proxy – advantage
– Experience in C++ development – advantage
– Technology independent – looking to experience with various technologies and trends of web protocols
– Quick to adapt new technologies.
– High performing coding capabilities
– Lead design and implementation of features end-to-end

Gigya is looking for Front End Developer to join our team developing web application & SDK for our leading SaaS platform.
About The Position:
At this position you will take full ownership on developing Gigya’s management console using a different SPA technologies. Moreover take part in the development of the different SDKs being implemented and used by our client. You will challenge yourself with with Angular2 (TypeScript), ES6, Node.js and more.
 At Gigya, we can promise you three things:
– A challenging environment – You will work with the most cutting edge technologies  available , contributing to your development experience and professional skillset.
– Inspiration – You will work with other techies and experienced, battle-hardened managers, who will push you to new limits and help you develop your full potential. At Gigya, the best idea wins.
– Convenient and fun – Our offices are located in Azrieli Towers with a breathtaking view and ar easily accessible by bus, car and train. We’ve got the best gadgets and frequently participate in fun, exciting and team-building activities.
Requirements:
– At least 3 years of experience in web development (client-side).
– Experience with developing Single Page Applications.
– Experience with Object Oriented JavaScript
– Experience in the design of software architecture
– Exceptional self-learning capabilities
Extra points for:
– Experience with JS Frameworks such as Angular, React, Aurelia and Ember.
– Experience with native mobile apps development (iOS/Android).
– Development experience in server-side languages such as C#, Java, Node.js, Python and PHP.
To send a CV for the position of Front End Developer – Gigya
DataZone is a boutique professional services provider for various big data technologies. We help organizations to focus on their application rather than infrastructure. We solve sophisticated problems on daily basis and bringing value to our customer base.
We are also premier level partner of some of the largest data vendors world wide – Elastic, Couchbase, IronSource Atom and more.
Requirements:
– Minimum of 3 years’ experience with any database technology as a DBA / DevOps Engineer / Data Engineer / Software Engineer* Ability to write simple code with one of the following: C#, Java, Python, Scala, Node.JS
– Understanding of distributed computing system principals
– Deep experience with at least one of the following: MySQL, Postgres SQL, MongoDB, Couchbase, Elasticsearch, Splunk, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, StreamSets
– Deep knowledge in Elasticsearch and the Elastic Stack – advantage
– Israeli Security clearance level 4 – advantage
– MSc in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related discipline- an advantage.
– At-least 3 years’ experience in data science and algorithms research and development.
– Strong analytical skills, with proven track record including publications, development and deployment experience.
– Solid foundation and background in machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, with broad understanding of supervised and unsupervised learning methods and algorithms.
– Experience working with modern programming languages: Python, Java, R, Matlab for interactive data research, algorithms and analytics packages development.
– Practical experience with: sensor data, big data and complex data processing chains is a big plus.
– Experience working within cross-disciplinary teams in a dynamic, fast paced environment.
– Fluent in English (written and verbal), other languages are a plus.

Our clients, some of which are among the most prominent websites worldwide, utilize our platform to enhance their online presence.

Use your skills and experience to develop high-performance sites, SEO, real-time monitoring, mobile solutions and web APIs.
Work in agile methodology (Scrum/Kanban/etc.).
Develop scalable web applications in cutting edge technologies, such as: PHP, RoR, NodeJS, AngularJS, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, etc.
Lead technological initiatives and improvements while instilling development “best practices”.
Requirements:
– At least 6 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, jQuery, ReactJS (Angular- an advantage).
– 2+ year’s hands-on experience in OOP and design patterns in one of the following technologies: PHP/RoR/NodeJS/.NET/Java.
– Experience with cross-browser compatibility testing and troubleshooting.
– Understanding the differences between multiple delivery platforms (such as mobile vs. desktop), and optimizing UI to match the specific platform (responsive/ adaptive).
– Ability to translate UI/UX wireframes to visual elements.
– B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science or a similar degree (from a leading university – preferred) – an advantage.

You will be working on developing and applying deep learning and NLP algorithms. The ranges of problems include natural language interactions, cognitive computing, data mining, anomaly detection, classification and modeling. You will be working with other researchers from different labs in GRC and business units on identifying needs, sharing common solutions, and implementing solutions. Together you will define frameworks, and implement components for the efficient and scalable deployment of analytics in the industrial cloud.
In this role you will: 
– Carry out AI related research work
– Cooperate with other researchers in identifying needs, defining the research topics and the desired outcomes
– Introduce state of the art methods using deep learning, NLP, and cognitive computing to the lab
– Implement algorithms preferably in Python, Java, and C++ environments
– Collaborate with and coach other researchers in the lab
– As a researcher you will have the responsibility for developing innovative technologies, envisioning research directions and executing AI research projects using machine learning technologies.
Requirements:
– Ph.D in computer science or related fields doing research in the fields of machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, NLP, cognitive computing
– 3+ years of experience in industrial or postdoc environment
– Good knowledge of the field, being up to date on the state of the art.
– Good analytical skills and original thinking
– Good system level understanding of problems
– Experience in implementing algorithms using Python, Java, C++
– Benefit – experience in implementing algorithms using GPU
– Benefit – experience in developing for cloud based solutions
– Independent and innovative with the ability to lead problem definition and goal definition processes
– Good communication skills
– Fluent in English
To send a CV for the position of Senior Research Scientist – General Electric
A company working in the Internet Marketing realm, mainly in online gaming, we are looking for a strong and ambitious Full-Stack developer, experienced and passionate with web development.
You will be part of a team develop software solutions with wide range of technologies: from BigData high performance systems to web systems, and tailor made tools. We look for the Web Ninja that keep study new technologies, that believe in choosing the right tool and development language to get the job done.
We work in scrum, and have cool and friendly web ninjas with 10~ years of experience that will assist you to bootstrap your knowledge and to feel part of a great and bright team.
Job Description: 
– Analyze requirements and specifications from product manager & development manager.
– Design and implement technical solutions with emphasis on quality and performance, from architecture and technology selection to a full implementation and production support.
– Build new systems and features, heavily based on AWS.
– Develop in web technologies, server-side (70%) and client-side (30%).
– Develop a testable code, with unit tests and QA Automation in mind.
– Maintain code, troubleshoot & solve issues in live sites and systems.
– Work in SCRUM teams that encourage collaboration and face to face communication.
Requirements: 
– Strong Full-stack developer with get things done approach.
– Endless curiosity about how things work, especially the web.
– Strong database knowledge (SQL, NoSQL).
– Familiarity with AWS (RDS, DynamoDb, lambda)
– Experience with Git source control branch strategies and repository management.
– At least 3 years’ experience in one or more of PHP \ Python \ node.js
– At least 2 years of hands-on experience in SQL, HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery, CSS, XML, Ajax, JSON
– Experience in node.js & AWS – Major advantage
– Experience in Angular.js – Major Advantage
– Experience working with Linux environment
– Link to github page – a huge Advantage!
General Requirements: 
– First degree in Computer Sciences / Information System
– Ability to learn fast by yourself.
– Strong interpersonal skills & Team player
– Self-motivated and a self-learner
– Passion for code and technologies, pro-active and has the desire to learn
– Fun to work with, at least as much as we are!
